Class MapManager

  • public final class MapManager
extends Object
    A static class for map file management.
    Author:
    Ryan Gilera ryangilera@gmail.com

      • openFile

        public static Map openFile(File file,
                           boolean isCurrentMapSave,
                           MainApp app)
        Opens the JSON map file
        Parameters:
        file - The file object that holds the map data
        isCurrentMapSave - A boolean flag that tracks if the current map generated is saved or not
        app - The MainApp object for retrieving the stage object
        Returns:
        the Map object if successfully opened, otherwise null

      • verifyFileToOpen

        public static boolean verifyFileToOpen(File file,
                                       MainApp app)
        Verifies if the File object is a valid map file for opening the file.
        Parameters:
        file - The file object that holds the map data
        app - The MainApp object for retrieving the stage object
        Returns:
        true if the file is valid, otherwise false

      • verifyFileToSave

        public static boolean verifyFileToSave(File file,
                                       LogManager logManager,
                                       MainApp app,
                                       Map map,
                                       int numberOfColumns,
                                       int numberOfRows)
        Parameters:
        file - The file object that holds the map data
        logManager - The LogManager that handles log events
        app - The MainApp object for retrieving the stage object
        map - The Map object that holds the map data
        numberOfColumns - The number of columns
        numberOfRows - The number of rows
        Returns:
        true if the file is valid, otherwise false
